subject: Add Vite dev proxy for Unum API CORS
body:
- Configure proxy in vite.config.ts: /api/unum -> unum.co.za/one/api
- Update Unum.service.ts to use proxy path in development
- Document production CORS solution needed in PRODUCTION_CHECKLIST.md
- Update IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md with completed Unum API tasks

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Add Vite dev proxy for Unum API CORS
